channel.title: Exhaustion on Disconnected
channel.description: Recent content in Exhaustion on Disconnected

item.title: Chasing Exhaustion
item.description: I’ve been emotionally exhausted for quite a while. After being seemingly ghosted by my most recent partner, I just don’t feel anything. Sure for a while I did feel sad and such, but, now I just feel tired. I suppose going from one relationship to the next has grown old. I’d rather cherish strong meaningful friendships at the moment. I really have no incentive to jump head-first into yet another relationship.
